column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////It was a freezing cold day
column2: but we were gladly seated in the back away from the front door. Once we sat down Â and looked over the menu
column3: we finally decided on our order. 1 order of spinach bread
column4: 1 med. deep dish Spinach and Garlic pizza and 1 med. deep dish Green peppers and onions pizza... The bread came out first
column6: flavorful and just enough to hold you over during the 30 mins it takes to make the deep dish pizzas ( do not come here if you are in a super rush!)
